function_description: Create a new board using the three-dot sidebar menu of a project.
initial_state: User is viewing the list of projects within the 4ga Boards app, with at least one project available.
steps: Navigate to the sidebar menu and locate the desired project.
Click the three-dot menu next to the project's name.
Select the option to add a board from the menu.
In the pop-up window, enter a name for the new board in the textbox.
Optionally, choose a template or import data as needed.
Click the 'Add Board' button to finalize creation.
expected_state: A new board is added to the selected project, visible under the project with all specified configurations.
